content: I am responsible. I keep up with my daily routine. I take my vitamins. I visit my physician every three to six months. She and her staff poke and prod. They make sure my levels are where they need to be for me to continue to live a vibrant life. I smile. I nod. I tell her I have gained 23 lbs. She looks at my digital chart, nods, smiles, takes in what I am saying. She asks me about the weight gain. I tell her about you.
